comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

Hi, thanks for submitting the bug. I don't know what's going on here. I cannot reproduce with your instructions. I'm running your sample code mlflow_logger = MLFlowLogger(experiment_name="test-experiment", tracking_uri="http://127.0.0.1:5000") trainer = Trainer(logger=mlflow_logger) trainer.logger.experiment_id and the tracking uri I got from running mlflow ui The experiment shows up in the UI and I get no errors. I verified this with the latest version of PL and mlflow, python 3.7. Is there any other information you can provide on the issue?

Thanks for the quick response, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awaelchli>@awaelchli</denchmark-link> ! I did nothing different this morning and I am able to log metrics/parameters to mlflow. I will close this now and in case I encounter this again, I will reopen this issue.
